entities.name: students
entities.description: The students were sitting at tables with glittering golden plates and goblets.

entities.name: tables
entities.description: These tables were laid with glittering golden plates and goblets.

entities.name: plates
entities.description: These tables were laid with glittering golden plates and goblets.

entities.name: goblets
entities.description: These tables were laid with glittering golden plates and goblets.

entities.name: Professor McGonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall led the first-years up to a long table where the teachers were sitting.

entities.name: teachers
entities.description: At the top of the Hall was another long table where the teachers were sitting.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Mainly to avoid all the staring eyes, Harry looked upwards and saw a velvety black ceiling dotted with stars.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: He heard Hermione whisper, ‘It’s bewitched to look like the sky outside, I read about it in Hogwarts: A History .’

entities.name: Great Hall
entities.description: It was hard to believe there was a ceiling there at all, and that the Great Hall didn’t simply open on to the heavens.

entities.name: Hogwarts: A History
entities.description: He heard Hermione whisper, ‘It’s bewitched to look like the sky outside, I read about it in Hogwarts: A History .’

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall led the first-years up to a long table where the teachers were sitting.
Mainly to avoid all the staring eyes, Harry looked upwards and saw a velvety black ceiling dotted with stars.
He heard Hermione whisper, ‘It’s bewitched to look like the sky outside, I read about it in Hogwarts: A History .’
